features: Never Forget Important Details - With its smooth surface, this glass whiteboard for your desk lets you jot down notes, write reminders, and check your to-do lists without having to leave your workstation.
Markers & Eraser Included - The glass dry erase board comes with 4 markers. Once you’re done with your tasks, you can easily wipe the glass desktop dry erase board clean using the included eraser.
Organize Your Desktop Accessories - This glass desktop whiteboard helps you keep your table clutter-free. Just put your markers, eraser, and other computer desk accessories in the built-in storage!
Elevate Your Set Up - Designed with a dedicated slot for your smartphone and tablet, this desktop glass whiteboard helps you maximize your workspace. It's even designed with a nifty charging slot.
A Perfect Fit - This 9.5x6.5x15.76” glass white board for desk fits right between your monitor and keyboard so that it's always in front of you. The dry erase desktop board won't take up much space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Take notes faster! 2 Share your ideas! 3 Be organized! 4 You perfect setup!

With its smooth surface, this glass whiteboard for your desk lets you jot down notes, write reminders, and check your to-do lists without having to leave your workstation. Designed with a dedicated slot for your smartphone and tablet, this desktop glass whiteboard helps you maximize your workspace.

The glass dry erase board comes with 4 markers. Once you’re done with your tasks, you can easily wipe the glass desktop dry erase board clean using the included eraser. You can even charge your devices through the accessory charging slot. Connect your smartphone or tablet passing the cable through the holes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space-saving, adds productivity
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my husband who loves using whiteboards, for him to use at the desk that doesn't have a whiteboard on the wall. :D It sits on the desk right behind his keyboard in front of his monitor, and he uses it to take notes and make lists all the time. Has a little storage inside to hold the markers and other small items. Great utility in a compact space! Love that it's a glass surface and not plastic, so it will actually clean and not get more and more stained over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So useful and. Convenient
reviews.reviewText: It keeps my desk clutter free and clean. Quickie easy way for quick reminders, small and compact. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tidy Storage of Diabetic Supplies
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a place to record daily weight, glucose and ketone data for a recent diabetes diagnosis, and lifestyle change to correct that.Several co-workers received these as Christmas presents, and I thought it would be a perfect way to record daily numbers and store away lancets, alcohol wipes, test strips, meter and lancet device used in blood testing.It's perfect. Everything fits neatly and it's a great scoreboard to track the data on the dry erase board. Gives me a good visual of progress and a great storage solution for all the gear.Hopefully, in the near future all that gear won't be needed, but until then a very cool way to track and keep gear in storage until needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is actually really useful and I like it a lot
reviews.reviewText: I wish the markers were more fine-point (they're chalk, not silicone polymer like 'most" dry erase markers are), and while it seems a regular dry erase marker will work on it, since I got the black, they can't be seen, so if that's a concern for you, go with the white. I honestly may get one for home as well (I bought this one for the office).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most used item on my desk
reviews.reviewText: Love this thing! I didn't realize how many sticky notes I was wasting. Now I can write on this and not worry about it. Plus my coworkers love writing on it too. Very sturdy, lots of storage. I wish it had more than one pen holder, but definitely not a deal breaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best work investment all year!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to save paper. I use scratch paper constantly. This has been Game changer! No more shredding or blanking out info. Simply erase!! I'm obsessed with this and use it every day all day!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful! Life saver!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I couldn't believe the Whiteboard was glass. I didn't catch that mentioned, but I think that makes it better than others. I love I can prop both of my phones up in the slot it has.I use teams & other task apps for daily reminders but there's nothing better than something in your face lol well on your desk that you can just erase when you are finished. This comes in handy all throughout my work day when answering the phone & taking phone numbers, putting a project briefly on hold, my boss needs something urgent by the end of the day etc. Fits well on my desk & cleans very well with the end of the markers. I'm sure I can also clean it with class cleaner once I've had more months of usage in & if needed. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've managed to completely de clutter my desk thanks to this little thing. The whiteboard works for end of day tasks, and reminders! It's great for any office setting!
Buenos materials el tamaño es ideal para almacenar cosas la escritura es buena y el borrado muy cebcillo, sobretodo el precio me parece excelente lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Solo si se presentó la situación de dos marcadores secos, cómo hacen referencia otras opiniones.
